greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of states in minimal automaton that recognizes biquanimous numbers in base n.
comment: A biquanimous number (A064544) is a number whose digits can be split into two groups with equal sums.
reference: Jeffrey Shallit, A Second Course in Formal Languages and Automata Theory, Cambridge, 2008; see Exercise 3.55.
link: Jingzhe Tang, C++ code calculating terms
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 03 2001
